fullplot: Cornelis is the unique chronicle about one of Sweden's greatest music legends - Cornelis Vreeswijk. An honest and gripping account of an exceptionally talented, but self-destructive artist's intense life both on and behind the stage. A man who during his whole life was searching for love and confirmation.
plot: Biographical account of singer and composer Cornelis Vreeswijk including his breakthrough and his marital problems.
title: Cornelis
